interpretation: The "crayon" card represents creativity, self-expression, and playfulness. Just as a child uses a crayon to draw whatever comes to mind, this card encourages you to tap into your inner child and let your imagination run free. This is a time to explore your passions and hobbies without fear of judgment or criticism. Embrace your unique voice and express yourself in a way that feels authentic to you. However, be mindful not to get too caught up in your own world and neglect your responsibilities. Remember to balance your creative pursuits with practicality. Overall, the "crayon" card reminds you to have fun, be spontaneous, and trust in your own creative abilities.
